name: Jumping Jelly
description:
Take up the challenge and face true high-stakes platforming in Jumping Jelly!
Climb upwards to reach your Goal, but be careful; once you are in the air there is no turning back!

Hold to charge and release to jump away!
This is easier said than done and incredebly hard to master.

Make sure to go fast, otherwise you will get problems quickly...
The harder you jump, the harder you fall
The faster you jump, the faster you fall
Your mind is your only enemy!

Tension rises with each jump when a single mistake means a long fall - and you have to get back up all by yourself...

The reward will be worth it! Nail-Biting high tension action is ahead of you! Challenge your friends to reach the highscore!

Note: This Game was made for the "Mini Jam 106" with the Theme "Frogs" and the limitation "Limited Time" in under 72 hours! Please keep in mind that some parts of the Project are not finished or well polished due to these limitations!

Credits:

Frog Sprite - by Laura Morrigan:
https://www.pinterest.de/pin/432978951650220616/

Music - by CodeManu:
https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-game-music-pack

Heavily inspired by Jump King:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1061090/Jump_King/
